tweets.text: True wealth looks different than you think.
Good morning. Today is going to be a great day. Let’s get after it relentlessly.

Elon Musk has now built three different $100+ billion companies in his career.

Pretty incredible.

One way to think about financial returns is how long it has recently taken to capture a 200% return on an asset:

- S&P 500: 12 years
- Gold: Over 15 years
- Bitcoin: 2 years

Bitcoin continues to be the fastest horse.

The hysteria in financial markets has been completely overblown.

I have been saying this for weeks and now it is proving true.

Stocks up. Bitcoin up. Jobs up. 

Inflation down. 

Critics in disbelief.

.
@jvisserlabs
 spent 30 years on Wall Street looking for opportunities in the macro environment.

He believes we are on the precipice of bitcoin's rise to the global reserve currency, which is being accelerated by sanctions, economic policy, and decentralization trends.

This

Went to a friend’s wedding last night with 
@polinapompliano
 

Reminds me of a quote from Lao Tzu: 

“Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.”

The smartest people I know:

1. Obsessively read books
2. Pursue new mental models
3. Enjoy intelligent discourse
4. Quickly admit when they're wrong
5. Comfortable changing their opinion
6. Surround themselves w/ intelligence
7. Seek to understand every perspective on a topic
Three of the most dangerous organizations in American society are universities, city councils, and teacher unions.

Universities teach young people to hate their country, city councils are preventing housing from being built & contributing to the housing crisis, and teacher unions are holding children hostage as they negotiate better pay for worst outcomes.

Each is a systemic issue.

Shedeur Sanders' situation reminds me of the Franklin D. Roosevelt quote:

"Never underestimate a man who overestimates himself."

“You cannot become thorough Americans if you think of yourselves in groups. America does not consist of groups. A man who thinks of himself as belonging to a particular nations group in America has not yet become an American.” - President Woodrow Wilson

In hindsight, all you had to do for the last decade was buy bitcoin.

You beat Buffett. You beat every hedge fund. You beat every institution.

No special access needed. No crazy analysis required. 

You just had to buy bitcoin & chill.

Don Hankey has the best website on the internet.

He chose to publish his financial assets, his investment returns, and specific details of his various lines of credit on his homepage.

Incredible.
